title: Former top SpaceX lawyer joins Surf Air Mobility as it prepares to go public
summary: David Anderman, who recently served as SpaceX general counsel, is joining soon-to-be-public company Surf Air Mobility, CNBC has learned.

title: Former Spaceflight CEO joins law firm to support commercial space clients
summary: The former chief executive of Spaceflight has joined a major law firm to lead its efforts in supporting the commercial space industry.

title: Luxembourg approves program to give NATO O3b mPower access
summary: SES said June 15 that Luxembourg has approved a program to carve out capacity from its O3b mPower medium Earth orbit broadband network for the country and NATO allies.

title: More countries encouraged to commit to halt destructive ASAT tests
summary: Despite an overwhelming vote of support by the United Nations General Assembly six months ago, advocates of a moratorium on one type of anti-satellite tests say they are still working to get more countries to adopt it.

title: For the first time in decades, Congress seems interested in space-based solar power
summary: "We already know from early research that it is possible."

title: Space Force working to define what it means to be a guardian
summary: Amid the growing pains that come with being a new military branch, the U.S. Space Force is trying to establish its brand and build an identity.

title: New Orbital Debris Mitigation Guidelines Released By World Economic Forum
summary: The World Economic Forum (WEF) has released The Space Industry Debris Mitigation Recommendations, new set of guidelines aimed at reducing its creation.

title: Scientists Discover Phosphorus on Enceladus
summary: A international team of scientists has made a groundbreaking discovery, finding phosphorus, an essential chemical element for life, locked inside salt-rich ice grains ejected into space from Saturn's moon Enceladus.

title: Tomorrow.io raises $87 million for weather satellite constellation
summary: “This is the world’s first commercially built weather radar satellite,” said Rei Goffer, Tomorrow.io co-founder and chief strategy officer.

title: Vulcan aces engine test, but upper stage anomaly will delay launch for a while
